resources.string: What makes a Strong Password?\nThe key aspects of a strong password are length (the longer the better); a mix of letters (upper and lower case), numbers, and symbols, no ties to your personal information, and no dictionary words.\n

Characteristics of strong passwords:

At least 8 charactersâ€”the more characters, the better.
 A mixture of both uppercase and lowercase letters.
 A mixture of letters and numbers.
 Inclusion of at least one special character, e.g., ! @ # ? ]
 Note: do not use < or > in your password, as both can cause problems in Web browsers.
Remove the password from the clipboard, once you have used it for security reasons.

This is a highly secure, random Password Generator application that generates random password and shows it's strength.
No permissions are required to use the app and no password is stored by the application.
